long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Capture test cases in plain English by recording your interactions with the application.

These test cases are formulated on https://testrigor.com.

With testRigor, tests are generated in plain English, eliminating reliance on XPath and guaranteeing ultra-stability. Additionally, enjoy a suite of tools provided by testRigor to maintain test cases effortlessly.

Elevate your company's testing standards with testRigor - it's easy, fast, and enjoyable.
